items.name: Ventor's Gamble
explicitMods: +52 to maximum Life
10% increased Quantity of Items found
36% increased Rarity of Items found
+25% to Fire Resistance
-3% to Cold Resistance
+57% to Lightning Resistance
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: Bisco's Leash
explicitMods: 5% increased Quantity of Items found

1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills
Rampage
flavourText: You were always there, by my side,
whether we sat or played.
Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead.
